# KnxNetIPVersion constructor

Creates a new KNX Version object

```csharp

```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| name | Readable name of the version |
| identifier | Identifier representing thjis version in the KnxNetIP header |
| headerlength | Size of the KnxNetIP header in this version |
